snippet: For university presidents like Susan Herbst, the Final Four offers a rare opportunity for an extended bonding session with key supporters who are basking in the glow of big-time sports success.
abstract: NCAA Final Four, among the biggest shows in sports, is a priceless opportunity for a university to burnish its national reputation and introduce itself to millions of viewers; for university presidents like Susan Herbst, political science professor who has been at the helm of Connecticut for almost three years, it also offers rare opportunity for an extended bonding session with key supporters who are basking in the glow of big-time sports success.
lead_paragraph: For university presidents like Susan Herbst, the Final Four offers a rare opportunity for an extended bonding session with key supporters who are basking in the glow of big-time sports success.

headline.main: For UConn, as Well as the Huskies, a Golden Opportunity to Impress
headline.print_headline: Huskies’ Run Gives UConn a Chance to Impress Also
